ship-title.name: Ship Particles
ship-title.description: Customize the particles of your ship!

enable-shipmod.name: Tint Ship Particles
enable-shipmod.description:
Enables tinting the Ship Particles. 

Disable this to disable tinting the ship particles entirely and use the vanilla colors.

swap-shipcolors.name: Swap Colors
swap-shipcolors.description:
Swaps P1 and P2 colors for tinting the ship particles. 

By default, the main ship particles do a gradient from P1 to P2, enabling this will make it do a gradient from P2 to P1 instead.

ship-customcolor.name: Ship - Use Custom Colors
ship-customcolor.description:
Tints the particles of your ship the custom color(s) defined in the following settings. 

 If this is disabled, the mod will do its default behavior of tinting the particles to your player colors. 
 To disable tinting all-together, disable the 'Tint Ship Particles' setting.

ship-startcolor.name: Main Particles - Start Color
ship-startcolor.description: The start color of the main trailing particles in the ship gamemode.

ship-endcolor.name: Main Particles - End Color
ship-endcolor.description: The end color of the main trailing particles in the ship gamemode.

shipclick-startcolor.name: Click Particles - Start Color
shipclick-startcolor.description: The start color of the particles shown when clicking in the ship gamemode.

shipclick-endcolor.name: Click Particles - End Color
shipclick-endcolor.description: The end color of the particles shown when clicking in the ship gamemode.

robot-title.name: Robot Particles
robot-title.description: Customize the particles of your robot!

enable-robotmod.name: Tint Robot Particles
enable-robotmod.description:
Enables tinting the Robot Particles. 

Disable this to disable tinting the robot particles entirely and use the vanilla colors.

swap-robotcolors.name: Swap Colors
swap-robotcolors.description:
Swaps P1 and P2 colors for tinting the robot particles. 

By default, the main robot particles do a gradient from P1 to P2, enabling this will make it do a gradient from P2 to P1 instead.

robot-customcolor.name: Robot - Use Custom Colors
robot-customcolor.description:
Tints the particles of your robot the custom color(s) defined in the following settings. 

 If this is disabled, the mod will do its default behavior of tinting the particles to your player colors. 
 To disable tinting all-together, disable the 'Tint Robot Particles' setting.

robot-startcolor.name: Main Particles - Start Color

robot-endcolor.name: Main Particles - End Color
robot-endcolor.description: The end color of the main trailing particles in the robot gamemode.

swing-title.name: Swing Copter Particles
swing-title.description: Customize the particles of your swing copter!

enable-swingmod.name: Tint Swing Copter Particles
enable-swingmod.description:
Enables tinting the Swing Copter Particles. 

Disable this to disable tinting the swing copter particles entirely and use the vanilla colors.

swap-swingcolors.name: Swap Colors
swap-swingcolors.description:
Swaps P1 and P2 colors for tinting the swing copter particles. 

By default, the main swing copter particles do a gradient from P1 to P2, enabling this will make it do a gradient from P2 to P1 instead.

swing-customcolor.name: Swing Copter - Use Custom Colors
swing-customcolor.description:
Tints the particles of your swing copter the custom color(s) defined in the following settings. 

 If this is disabled, the mod will do its default behavior of tinting the particles to your player colors. 
 To disable tinting all-together, disable the 'Tint Swing Copter Particles' setting.

swing-startcolor.name: Main Particles - Start Color
swing-startcolor.description: The start color of the main trailing particles in the swing copter gamemode.

swing-endcolor.name: Main Particles - End Color
swing-endcolor.description: The end color of the main trailing particles in the swing copter gamemode.

name: Colorful Particles
description: Customize particles you weren't able to!
